IX.iii.1.D.6.a
.
General Information on Changes in Marital and Dependency Status
Any change in a parent’s marital status requires application of a different rate table from
Parents’ DIC rate charts
to determine the parent’s rate after the change in marital status.  This includes
death of the other surviving parent
death of a spouse who is not the Veteran’s other parent
separation
divorce, or
remarriage or reconciliation.
On receipt of notice of a change in marital status, use a locally-generated letter to request a current income statement.
